attributes.action: Police for Leysdown. Reopen our Police Station
attributes.background: HELP! Government cuts have taken our police away. Residents feel vulnerable & unsafe as crime rises at an alarming rate. Drugs, Thefts, Dog theft, car crime. We need to have our Police Station manned again and get this crime under control. Please sign and share with your friends and family. Thanks

rejection.details:
Local police services are the responsibility of your local elected Police and Crime Commissioner. You can contact your local PCC here:

http://www.kent-pcc.gov.uk/home.php?category=News
